mapper.select: select * from company_detail where industry_class = #{industry_class} limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(industry_class) as counting from company_detail where industry_class = #{indus_class}
select * from reviews where company_id = #{company_id} order by reg_date desc;
select count(*) as countreview from reviews where company_id=#{company_id}

select ifnull(TRUNCATE(avg(welfare),1),0) AS welfare, ifnull(TRUNCATE(avg(work_life_balance),1),0) as work_life_balance, ifnull(TRUNCATE(avg(inner_culture),1),0) as inner_culture,ifnull(TRUNCATE(avg(p_opportunity),1),0) as p_opportunity, ifnull(TRUNCATE(avg(management),1),0) as management, ifnull(TRUNCATE((avg(welfare)+avg(inner_culture)+avg(work_life_balance)+avg(p_opportunity)+avg(management))/5,2),0) as totalstar, TRUNCATE(avg(my_salary),0) as avgsalary from reviews where company_id = #{company_id}
mapper.insert: insert into reviews (company_id, review_content, review_likes, reg_date, mem_id, welfare, work_life_balance, inner_culture, p_opportunity, management, pros, cons, my_salary, current_yn) values (#{company_id}, #{review_content}, 0, NOW(), #{mem_id}, #{welfare}, #{work_life_balance}, #{inner_culture}, #{p_opportunity}, #{management}, #{pros}, #{cons}, #{my_salary}, #{current_yn})
